message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000.  I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective on the value, the product's potential warrants a higher price. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000. This offer reflects a fair balance between its value and my initial investment.

I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not convinced that $1,050,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering $950,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's worth to me.
